name: Beach Bike Stunt Champion
description:
This is jump bike racing game in which you have to do bike stunt and take all the check points on the beach and roads in given time to complete the level. Might be you ever played many motorcycle games but this fast riding motorbike racing game is just outstanding with wonderful graphics and outstanding 3d environment.
Features
• Realistic Miami Beach Environment
• Top beach bike games
• Best beach bike simulator of the world
• Perform amazing stunts on beach ramps
• Bike selection options
• HD graphics and island sounds
